title: There's Always a Price Tag
description: Small time freelance worker Glyn Nash rescues a drunken billionaire film director Dester from being run over, and soon gets appointed by the latter at his Hollywood residence, much against the wishes of Dester's glamorous and shady wife, Helen Dester. Glyn sees the employment as an opportunity to become rich and famous, not knowing what is in store for him.(wikipedia.org)
author: James Hadley Chase
